text: @US_FDA Well done at news conference today. Consider modeling social distancing on stage - Covid-19 team members and President Trump are packed together and the room has more than 10 people in it.  #Trump #MelaniaTrump #Pence #Hahn #actionsspeaklouderthanwords #Covid19, #fda2020 #Ivanka
